channel.title: Need help
channel.description:
........how to fix this....... when the creatures die on my server they don't drop anything........when they r supposed to...... the creatures that i made respawn in an area they are not supposed to like black drgs spawnning in varrock won't die......when i kill they stay alive with full health.....
so if anyone know how to fix these two probs.......
also how to make shops in........ one more thing how to tell a shops id.......(in my shop.cfg file it has the shop ids of the shops already setup but i want to know how they assigned the ids to shops and ect......)
any help would be appreciated..... also im using pimpscape as my server base.....
P.S. i also would like to know how to change the port my server runs on cause it runs on port 5555 right now and i want to change back to 43594

plz help me out…(still willing to do anything to get this to work…)

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @Haxor_X Haxor X
item.description:
@Haxor_X wrote:

i did wat your friends tut says but this show up when i compile…

Item3.java:32: expected
Item3.randomITEM3NAME()
^
Item3.java:32: ‘;’ expected
Item3.randomITEM3NAME()
^
Item3.java:33: ‘;’ expected
public static int Black Dragon[] = {2415,2661,2663,2665,2667,3479,4037,4041,1004
,536,989};
^
Item3.java:33: expected
public static int Black Dragon[] = {2415,2661,2663,2665,2667,3479,4037,4041,1004
,536,989};
^
Item3.java:34: ‘;’ expected
public static int randomBlack Dragon()
^
Item3.java:34: invalid method declaration; return type required
public static int randomBlack Dragon()
^
Item3.java:36: ‘;’ expected
return Black Dragon[(int)(Math.random()*Black Dragon.length)];
^
Item3.java:36: ‘)’ expected
return Black Dragon[(int)(Math.random()*Black Dragon.length)];
^
Item3.java:36: not a statement
return Black Dragon[(int)(Math.random()*Black Dragon.length)];
^
Item3.java:36: not a statement
return Black Dragon[(int)(Math.random()*Black Dragon.length)];
^
Item3.java:36: ‘;’ expected
return Black Dragon[(int)(Math.random()*Black Dragon.length)];
^
Item3.java:37: reached end of file while parsing
}→
^
12 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

so tell me wat i did wrong casue i did all your friends tut says…

Also thx for the tut on shops…
i like it much easier to under stand then your friends…
either that or making random drops is harder then making shops…

also i just remembered one more thing i want to know how to make a bank…
cause i want some banks in areas where there is no bank…

Read full topic

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Ok, go here. It’s a tutorial for random NPC drops that one of my friends made.

Ok here’s my shops tutorial that I just threw together.

Ok, open up shops.cfg. Add this

shop = ##	NAMEOFSHOP					2	2	ITEMID	AMOUNT	ITEMID	AMOUNT

Replace the required things. Now open up autospawn.cfg. Add this underneath your Aubury spawn

spawn = NPCID	XCOORD	YCOORD	0	0	0	0	0	1	Joe shop

Replace the required things. Now open up client.java and under

WanneShop = 2; //Aubury Magic Shop

add this

} else if (NPCID == NPCOFID) { //SHOPNAME PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = ##; //SHOPNAME
Replace the required things, but ~DO NOT TOUCH “NPCID”~. Now save, compile and run.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @alvaroboldo alvaroboldo
item.description:
@alvaroboldo wrote:

for the port enter to server.java and search for

public static int serverlistenerPort = 5555;

and change it to the port you want

about the dragons in varrock they have full health bc they have like 3k of hp points…
i recommend remove them bc they drop white and black stuff…

the shops id are in the client.java…
